sentences: The contact group on Annex I communications continued its consideration of the draft common reporting format tables and began discussing draft conclusions on Protocol Articles 5 (methodology), 7 (communications) and 8 (review of information).
The group also considered whether reporting of total emissions should include emissions and removals from LULUCF.
enb_long_title: Tenth Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI)
